channel.title: Terrorism
channel.description:
What's the deal with terrorism?
All Muslims are [b]NOT[/b] terrorists, but all terrorists [b]ARE[/b] Muslim. Weird huh?

item.title: Terrorism
item.dc:creator: @nubers nubers
item.description:
@nubers wrote:

[quote=“Canownueazy, post:59, topic:365247”][quote author=nubers link=topic=461452.msg3379477#msg3379477 date=1287905269]

What’s the deal with terrorism?

All Muslims are NOT terrorists, but all terrorists ARE Muslim. Weird huh?

as i said i didnt know what i was talking about

Well MOST terrorist are Muslim, but they are the extremest’s who go to far. i don’t know much about the Muslim’s ways and beliefs but i think, i’m not sure but i think the Muslim profit Muhammad believed that killing and hurting others was a way to get into heaven.

I’m not sure about what I wrote, I do not hate Muslims I respect there ways, as I would expect them to do the same.
[/quote]Wrong. Muhammad believed that Muslims have a “Jihad” (a mission in their lives) to keep Islam alive.[/quote]

as i said i didnt know what i was talking about

item.title: Terrorism
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:44, topic:365247”]Stop the fucking Arab shit. Muslims can’t be terrorists, because if they would be then they wouldn’t be muslims.

Its said in our only one holy book “if you are a terrorist, you are not muslim”. If I’m a terrorist, I wouldn’t be Muslim. If I was Muslim, I wouldn’t be a terrorist, because if I was a terrorist, I wouldn’t be Muslim. That means that no terrorist is muslim.

Why can’t you noobs just understand that Muslims can’t be terrorists because if they were, they wouldn’t be Muslim???
Talibans can’t be Muslim. I don’t know much about them, but they are people who blow others up. Basically, not Muslim once again.[/quote]All these “peace” notes you see from the Qu’ran were to lie to the Jews that Islam is peaceful. The Muslims & Jews were once allies. When Muhammad wanted the Jews to accept him as their messiah, the Jews declined. Muhammad gathered with Arab war forces and attacked the Jews making them wear certain clothing (such as belts around their robes) and paying a fee to stay alive.

NOT ALL MUSLIMS ARE TERRORISTS but ALL of them are evil.

@Davidi2
The Muslim Brotherhood (Now named Taliban) was founded in 1928. It was founded to reuprise the Islamic Empire as it once ruled 70% of the globe. In 1948 the Taliban called Israel “Small satan” and the United States “Satan”

Don’t tell me it’s because the Jews stole their land. The Jews (specifically Abraham) were granted Israel from God. Judaism is far older than Islam. Islam was started around year 100 (after Christ)

Read full topic

[quote=“krackkid, post:51, topic:365247”]Davidi I rather not even start with you again, cause until you think your right you don’t stop. End of discussion on that matter.[/quote](Just call me David)

The reason I’m trying to say this is because I don’t think you understand what he’s saying, and by replying as you did might have started a flame war with Usman. He wasn’t saying that the Terrorism stuff only happened in the past, he was simply stating that he understood what I was saying about the religion.

Hopefully you understand now, that’s all I’m going to say.
